actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to continue the present duty-free status of repair parts, materials, and equipment purchased in Panama for, and repairs made in Panama to, vessels documented under the laws of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to exempt purchases of repair parts and equipment and repairs made in Panama from the duty otherwise owed by a U.S. vessel.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to continue the present duty-free status of repair parts, materials, and equipment purchased in Panama for, and repairs made in Panama to, vessels documented under the laws of the United States.
